
{{alias}}( str )
    Returns a string with the first character converted to lowercase.

    Parameters
    ----------
    str: string
        Input string.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string
        String with lower-cased first character.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 'JavaScript' )
    'javaScript'
    > out = {{alias}}( 'Boop' )
    'boop'

    See Also
    --------
